issue.title: [Archery][CI] Change the links on the email to point to the job run instead of the branch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16334](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16334). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current link that we send on the nightly email report is the link to the branch. When we want to understand what is the failure we want to go to the build itself and not to the branch.

This ticket aims to update the link in the reports to point to the build instead of the branch.
